amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section prohibiting the EEOC from using funds to implement pay data collection.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 113 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike section prohibiting the EEOC from using funds to implement pay data collection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A111) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 223 (Roll no. 495).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A111) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 223 (Roll no. 495).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A111) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
